name: Light in the night
description:
Light in the night is a pixel art bullet hell where you control Unic. You are alone in a space base with a lot of enemies, created by the crazy Scientist. You must control your powers against the enemies to destroy them.

Authors

- Eduard Corral. Twitter: @EduEnTw

- Paula Ros. Twitter: @paularosm_

Items Enemies

Every enemy can be formed by one color: red, blue or green. You must have your color weapon ready to destroy them.
